definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: However, the present studies focus on the successes of Yong-Cheng.
sentences.chinese: 然而，綜觀目前研究，學者多聚焦於雍正帝的功業。

sentences.english: Yu of the Xia Dynasty exploited the road towards civilization in the Huanghe River Basin.
sentences.chinese: 夏禹的功業，據說開闢了黃河流域邁向文明的道路。

sentences.english: His achievements are worthy of record.
sentences.chinese: 他的功業是值得記載的。

sentences.english: Why do they admire works written in blood?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他們讚美鮮血書就的功業？

sentences.english: While Confucianism emphasizes achievement and propriety, Taoism stresses the unseen strengths in being humble and, in some cases, being perceived as average.
sentences.chinese: 儒家強調功業與禮儀，道家則強調清靜無爲。

definition: scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
to make a contribution/to establish/to found/contribution
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
